metadata.title: CVE-2023-22997 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel before 6.1.2, kernel/module/decompress.c misinterpretsthe module_get_next_page return value (expects it to be NULL in the errorcase, whereas it is actually an error pointer).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-22997` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.1.0-16.16
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.2.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.2.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1002.2
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required
